testcase.name: Verify that the homepage loads successfully.
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the homepage of Urban Ladder..................................passed Then The page title should contain "Urban Ladder"...........................passed

testcase.name: Verify user can sign up successfully
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the homepage of Urban Ladder..................................passed When Hover on the profile icon..............................................passed And Click on the Sign Up button.............................................passed And Complete the signup process with email and password "Testing1!".........passed Then Verify My Account is visible...........................................passed
